level.heading: Public records.
level.text: The Commissioner shall, as soon as practicable, make all rate filings, including all supporting documentation, amended filings, and reports filed pursuant to this chapter, available for public inspection either at the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking or on its website.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-360
level.text: For history of Law 18-360, see notes under ยง 31-3311.01.
